main event: A UFO sighting was reported on Sauvies Island, Oregon on January 9, 1956.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for one hour,The object was described as elongated and circular with lights on the side,It was observed as stationary over the Columbia River,The conclusions suggest it could likely be a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon, but there was insufficient data for a full evaluation.
sighted object: one elongated and circular object with lights on the side
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. J. Mayfair from Vancouver, Washington
